text: Hwanghak-dong is a dong, neighbourhood of Jung-gu in Seoul, South Korea. ==Attractions== *Hwanghak-dong Flea Market == Transportation == * Sindang Station of == See also == *Administrative divisions of South Korea ==References== * * ==External links== * Jung-gu Official site in English * Jung-gu Official site * Jung-gu Tour Guide from the Official site * Status quo of Jung-gu * Resident offices and maps of Jung-gu * Hwanghak-dong resident office website Category:Neighbourhoods of Jung-gu, Seoul
title: Hwanghak-dong
